title: Alba Botanica Hawaiian Facial Scrub, Pore Purifying Pineapple Enzyme 4 oz (Pack of 8)8
description: Pineapple enzymes, certified organic aloe vera and gentle exfoliating granules smooth away dull surface cells and impurities for a clear and radiant complexion. Features and benefits: This enzyme scrub buffs away surface cells and impurities with gentle corn cob meal, while delivering the benefits of soothing aloe, fruit enzymes and awaphui to stressed skin. This powerful one-two punch is designed to deliver effective deep-cleansing while maintaining your skin's delicate pH and infusing it with healing moisture.
